summary: Standardized traces/metrics and cleaned up alerts so fixing things got faster and alerts got quieter.

steps.label: Context
steps.body: Incidents took too long; alerts were noisy; teams lacked a common view across services.

steps.label: Goals
steps.body: Make issues visible fast, cut alert noise, and agree on what 'good' looks like (SLOs).

steps.label: What I changed
steps.body: OpenTelemetry everywhere; Prometheus + Grafana dashboards; SLOs with clear runbooks; deploy hygiene.

steps.label: Results
steps.body: p95 latency dropped; alert noise halved; MTTR improved while traffic still grew.
